channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260112)
item.description:
What's New

Implement AXObserver for real-time focus change detection

  • Add AXObserver to monitor kAXFocusedUIElementChangedNotification
  • Enables real-time focus detection for browser Cmd+T, new tabs, etc.
  • Setup observer on app switch and at launch for frontmost app
  • Reduce timer polling interval to 1s (backup for edge cases)
  • Always reset engine on focus change for consistent behavior
  • Improve focus change logging with source indicator (keyboard/AXObserver)
  • Update build version to 20260112

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
